text:
@neal_katyal To add to the ongoing assault on health care and all things Obama-legacy related, recall he promised people insurance companies would be reimbursed for covid care costs, then was walked back:

https://t.co/e03JG4VcZf

entity.name: Neal Katyal
entity.description: an American lawyer and partner at Hogan Lovells, as well as Paul and Patricia Saunders Professor of National Security Law at Georgetown University Law Center.

domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
